title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: The dialog details have some issues that need to be addressed:
1. The name validation is being duplicated on the first page.
2. The first and second columns in the dialog should be merged.

Additionally, I observed the following behaviors:
a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview text is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
OB:
a. The buttons in the dialog are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected, but both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview text is cut off.
d. The dialog appears huge for methods with many parameters.
EB:
The name validation should not be duplicated on the first page.
The first and second columns in the dialog should be merged.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Try changing a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview text is cut off.
4. Try modifying a method with many parameters.
5. Observe that the dialog appears huge.
